de.bitbrain.braingdx.behavior

Interface Behavior

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BehaviorAdapter, PointLightBehavior, RandomVelocityMovementBehavior, RasteredMovementBehavior, SpriteSheetAnimationSupplier, VelocityMovementBehavior

    public interface Behavior
    Behavior which is executed every single frame
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miguel Gonzalez Sanchez

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAttach(GameObject source)
      Callback which is called whenever this behavior gets attached to the source provided.
      void onDetach(GameObject source)
      Callback which is called whenever this behavior gets detached from the source provided.
      void update(GameObject source, float delta)
      Updates the behavior for a given source object.
      void update(GameObject source, GameObject target, float delta)
      Updates the behavior for a given source and a related target object.

    • Method Detail

      • onAttach

        void onAttach(GameObject source)
        Callback which is called whenever this behavior gets attached to the source provided.
        Parameters:
        source - the source where this behavior gets attached to

      • onDetach

        void onDetach(GameObject source)
        Callback which is called whenever this behavior gets detached from the source provided.
        Parameters:
        source - the source where this behavior gets detached from

      • update

        void update(GameObject source,
            float delta)
        Updates the behavior for a given source object.
        Parameters:
        source - the game object to apply the behavior to
        delta - current frame delta

      • update

        void update(GameObject source,
            GameObject target,
            float delta)
        Updates the behavior for a given source and a related target object.
        Parameters:
        source - the game object to apply the behavior to
        target - the game object to get information from
        delta - current frame delta
